category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Uploadable_Vendor_Part_Status
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Vendor part selection criteria based on status "preferred" or "backup". Please ensure that the same value is specified for the "IMDS_Uploadable_Vendor_Part_Status" global variable defined in the stylesheet (refer to the preference "IMDS_upload_xsl_name"). Valid values are: * preferred: System picks up Vendor Parts which are marked with "preferred" Vendor part status from the Vendor representations relation list. This is the default value. * backup : System picks up Vendor Parts which are marked with "backup" Vendor part status from the Vendor representations relation list.
